message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. I take 6000, you take 4000.  This deal gets us both something.
Alice, your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor. I'm proposing a more balanced split this time. Let's be reasonable and close this deal.
Bob, time is money, and we're both losing out here. I'm willing to come down slightly.  Take this offer and we both walk away with something substantial.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere.  A 50/50 split is the fairest and quickest way to end this.  Let's be practical.
